eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A BLUE ALERT FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: North Carolina; AT 08:38 AM ON OCT 30, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 08:38 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: THIS IS AN EXTENSION OF A NORTH CAROLINA BLUE ALERT FOR AN INJURED OFFICER. THE CRAVEN COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE IS STILL SEARCHING FOR DOMINIC LIAM CONNELLY. HE IS A 24 YEAR OLD WHITE MALE, APPROXIMATELY 5 FEET, 5 INCHES TALL, WEIGHING 135 POUNDS. DOMINIC LIAM CONNELLY HAS BLUE EYES AND BLONDE HAIR. HE WAS LAST SEEN WEARING A DARK COLORED SHIRT AND DARK COLORED PANTS. IF SIGHTED,  DO NOT APPROACH, CALL 911.  THIS IS AN EXTENSION OF A NORTH CAROLINA BLUE ALERT FOR AN INJURED OFFICER.
